Contact Gamayun

Summon Commander:#1944 Gamayun
The caster contacts a Gamayun and persuades it to aid him. The Gamayun is a magical half-woman, half-bird of Rus. It has the head and chest of a woman and the body and lower parts of a bird. It is a bird of wisdom and prophecy gifted with the knowledge of saints. It has magical skills as well as prophetic ones and is sometimes summoned to reveal magical secrets.
